snippet: Young undocumented immigrants who are allowed to work legally should be allowed to drive legally, too.
abstract: Editorial contends that young undocumented immigrants who are allowed to work legally in United States should be allowed to drive legally; expresses hope that more states will follow lead of few that grant licenses to all qualified drivers regardless of immigration status.
lead_paragraph: Young undocumented immigrants who are allowed to work legally should be allowed to drive legally, too.

keywords.value: Dream Act (Development, Relief and Education for Minors Act)
keywords.name: subject
